system.descriptionText: The Comrade performs some basic action that could be performed without requiring a Skill Test, such as helping a Character perform an activity (which reduces the time it takes by one Round per Comrade, to a minimum of one).

description.value: The Comrade performs some basic action that could be performed without requiring a Skill Test, such as helping a Character perform an activity (which reduces the time it takes by one Round per Comrade, to a minimum of one).
